      • isPartOf

        public boolean isPartOf(IPeriod period)
        Specified by:
        isPartOf in interface IPeriod
        Returns:
        true if all moments within this period are included within [period], otherwise false

      • unionWith

        public IPeriod unionWith(IPeriod period)
        Specified by:
        unionWith in interface IPeriod
        Returns:
        if this period and [period] are consecutive or possess a common intersection, then the smallest period p will be returned, for which this period and [period] are part of p, otherwise null will be returned

      • intersectionWith

        public IPeriod intersectionWith(IPeriod period)
        Specified by:
        intersectionWith in interface IPeriod
        Returns:
        the largest period which is part of this period and [period] will be returned; if the intersection is empty null will be returned
